tool_description: Evaluates writing style including tone, voice consistency, word choice, sentence variety, and provides enhancement suggestions for better flow and clarity.

text.description: Text to analyze for style improvements

target_audience.description: Intended audience: academic, professional, casual, or creative

writing_purpose.description: Writing purpose: informative, persuasive, narrative, or descriptive

formality_level.description: Desired formality: formal, semi-formal, or informal

check_passive_voice.description: Whether to flag excessive passive voice usage

analyze_sentence_variety.description: Whether to check for sentence length and structure variety

error_messages: Invalid target audience: Use one of [academic, professional, casual, creative].
Invalid writing purpose: Use one of [informative, persuasive, narrative, descriptive].
Invalid formality level: Use one of [formal, semi-formal, informal].
Text too short: Provide at least 50 characters for meaningful style analysis.
Text too long: Maximum 25,000 characters allowed for style analysis.
usage: Provide text with optional audience, purpose, and formality specifications. Returns style assessment with improvement suggestions.

tone_consistency.description: Assessment of tone consistency throughout text

passive_voice_instances.description: Number of passive voice constructions found

word_choice_flags.description: Words or phrases flagged for improvement
